items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js + Express API that fetches real-time weather data for any city using the OpenWeatherMap API. Just hit the /weather endpoint with a city name and get back the current temperature, city name, and weather description in JSON format. Tech Stack: Node.js Express.js Axios OpenWeatherMap API
items.title: PreetiPanda0405/WeatherAPI: A lightweight Node.js + Express API that fetches real-time weather data for any city using the OpenWeatherMap API. Just hit the /weather endpoint with a city name and get back the current temperature, city name, and weather description in JSON format.  Tech Stack: Node.js  Express.js  Axios  OpenWeatherMap API

items.content_html: ArwaCloths is a clean and responsive eCommerce website designed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This project is a front-end design concept for an online clothing store. It includes essential features like product listings, category filters, and a modern user interface â€“ all built with lightweight, beginner-friendly technologies.
